Sinopse: After the tragic death of his wife and his son, the north-American author Joseph Crone travels from the USA to Barcelona to meet his estranged brother, Samuel, and his dying father, Richard. However, the destiny has other plans for Joseph and his life becomes a series of strange happenings and he starts to repeatedly see the number 11 everywhere. His curiosity becomes an obsession and Joseph soon realizes that the number 11 has a horrific meaning, not only for himself, but probably for the whole human race. Isolated in a foreign country with only the support of his companion, Sadie, Joseph soon realizes that 11-11-11 is more than just a date, it's a WARNING.—Black Flag
